tempq: 17) Canada has only one bilingual province, that being Quebec.
18) Alaska is the most northern, western, and eastern state in the US.
19) The Pyrenees mountain range is between France and Italy.
20) Despite its name, the country of Ecuador does not lie on the equator.
22) A wireless mouse is not a perpheral device as it does not physically connect to the computer.
23) 'Concatenation' is the formal word for the addition of a string to another string.
